    public class Explosion
extends MovingImage
    Represents an explosion visual from a missile

    Michael Chen

        Makes an Explosion with img, x, y, w, and h
        Parameters:
        img - The image of the explosion
        x - The x coordinate of the center of the explosion
        y - The y coordinate of the center of the explosion
        w - The width of the explosion
